snippet: Two-time Wimbledon tennis champion Petra Kvitova, whose hand was wounded in a knife attack, will not play again for at least six months and it is too early to say when she can return to competition, her publicist said on Wednesday....
lead_paragraph: Two-time Wimbledon tennis champion Petra Kvitova, whose hand was wounded in a knife attack, will not play again for at least six months and it is too early to say when she can return to competition, her publicist said on Wednesday.

headline.main: Kvitova Out for Six Months After Surgery
headline.print_headline: Kvitova Out for Six Months After Surgery
